revised_title: Metabolic Analysis of Avian Development: Early Respiratory Quotient Measurements
tldr: This article presents a manometric analysis of the metabolism in avian ontogenesis, focusing on the respiratory quotient of blastoderm, embryo, and yolk-sac during the first week of development. The author discusses various methods for measuring respiratory quotient in vitro and provides experimental data on respiratory quotients of 5th day yolk-sac in Ringer-phosphate-glucose and embryos in amniotic liquid plus glucose.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
